descriptionNullable: This dataset comprises 47,000 grayscale images of faces, each resized to 48x48 pixels. These images depict various facial expressions, including happiness, neutrality, sadness, anger, surprise, disgust, and fear. To enhance balance, data augmentation techniques were employed. The dataset is provided in CSV format and serves as a valuable resource for emotion classification tasks. It includes 37,548 examples in the training set 4,732 in the public test set and 4,720 private test set.
title: New Facial Emotion Recognition
description: This dataset comprises 47,000 grayscale images of faces, each resized to 48x48 pixels. These images depict various facial expressions, including happiness, neutrality, sadness, anger, surprise, disgust, and fear. To enhance balance, data augmentation techniques were employed. The dataset is provided in CSV format and serves as a valuable resource for emotion classification tasks. It includes 37,548 examples in the training set 4,732 in the public test set and 4,720 private test set.
